alert.note: Alert for Chambers (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 2:21PM CDT until July 21 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CHAMBERS COUNTY... At 221 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Stroud to River View, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Valley, Lanett, Lafayette, Stroud, La Fayette, Lakeview, Five Points, Cusseta, Post Oak Forks, Denson, River View, Amity Park, Standing Rock, Welch, Buffalo, Chambers County Lake, Fredonia, Veasey Creek Park, Huguley and Fairfax. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
